bug.short_desc: Add drag and drop support to the TabView

long_desc.thetext: It would be comfortable when an user could order the pages from the TabView with drag and drop.

Are there any plans to implement this feature in the near future? If not, could a developer give me some hints how I would go about doing it myself?
I tried to replicate the drag/drop behavior found in the List demo, but I think the events are not even generated because the underlying widget is a button, is that right?

No, we don't have any plans to get that done any time soon. But if you want to take care of it, feel free to file a pull request on github. We would be happy about it. As a hint: The drag & drop API should be available on every widget, even on buttons. Still, I don't know if it's going to work because I never tried it on buttons. I simple check if it works basically on buttons could give you the initial answer and a better knowledge of the API itself.
